generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and traffic flowing on it.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the left side of the road, adjacent to the curb and some trees.
- building: A modern glass building and an older-style building are visible in the background.
- vegetation: Trees are visible along the sidewalk and in the background.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast.
- person: A few people can be seen walking on the sidewalk in the background.

- traffic light: A red traffic light is visible above the road, indicating stop.
- traffic sign: Several traffic signs are visible, including a yield sign and a pedestrian crossing sign.
- pole: Traffic light poles and sign poles are visible throughout the image.
